text: The 1998 Algarve Cup was the fifth edition of the Algarve Cup. ==Group A== Team Pts Pld W D L GF GA GD 6 3 2 0 1 5 2 +3 6 3 2 0 1 7 5 +2 6 3 2 0 1 3 4 −1 0 3 0 0 3 0 4 −4 \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Group B== Team Pts Pld W D L GF GA GD 7 3 2 1 0 8 0 +8 7 3 2 1 0 3 0 +3 3 3 1 0 2 2 8 −6 0 3 0 0 3 1 6 −5 \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Seventh Place== Portugal finished bottom of their group for the fifth year in a row. But they won the match to decide seventh place on penalties after a 2-2 draw with Finland. ==Fifth Place== ==Third Place== ==Final== ==Awards== Best player Marianne Pettersen ==References== ==Other websites== *1998 Algarve Cup on RSSSF Category:1998 in association football Category:Algarve Cup
title: 1998 Algarve Cup
